generated_doNotEdit.title: Move To Block Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows mob to move towards a block.

fields.title: Goal Radius
fields.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot

fields.title: Reach
fields.description: Event to run on block reached.

fields.title: Stay Completed
fields.description: Event to run on completing a stay of stay_duration at the block.

fields.title: Search Height
fields.description: The height in blocks that the mob will look for the block.

fields.title: Search Range
fields.description: The distance in blocks that the mob will look for the block.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

fields.title: Start Chance
fields.description: Chance to start the behavior (applied after each random tick_interval).

fields.title: Stay Duration
fields.description: Number of ticks needed to complete a stay at the block.

fields.title: Target Offset
fields.description: Offset to add to the selected target position.

fields.title: Target Selection Method
fields.description: Kind of block to find fitting the specification. Valid values are "random" and "nearest".

fields.title: Tick Interval
fields.description: Average interval in ticks to try to run this behavior.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
